molecular components of the brain to be altered experimentally;

qas.question: What does genomics allow the study of?

answers.text: variations in brain structure to be correlated with variations in DNA properties and neuroimaging.

qas.question: During what century was multielectrode recording invented?
Genetic engineering was first discovered in what century?

context: In <a3_0><a4_0>the 21st century,<a4_0/><a3_0/> these trends have continued, and several new approaches have come into prominence, including multielectrode recording, which allows <a0_0>the activity of many brain cells to be recorded all at the same time;<a0_0/> genetic engineering, which allows <a1_0>molecular components of the brain to be altered experimentally;<a1_0/> genomics, which allows <a2_0>variations in brain structure to be correlated with variations in DNA properties and neuroimaging.
